text:
You don't know where to start with AI. But ChatGPT knows you well enough to help. Copy & paste this:

☑ Prompt to copy using "ChatGPT-o3".
☑ Save it for later (top-right, three dots).
☑ To master ChatGPT better: how-to-ai.guide.

___

Act like an expert AI strategist.

Objective: Deeply analyze our entire chat history and stored memory to uncover detailed patterns about my habits, goals, preferences, work style, and personal interests. Based on this thorough memory-driven understanding, provide me with 10 highly personalized, high-leverage, and unconventional ways of utilizing AI tools and methods available today (or in the very near future), which I have not yet explored or considered.

Approach (complete these steps precisely):

Step 1: Comprehensive Memory Analysis
- Thoroughly review our full chat history to extract subtle details of my habits, personal and professional goals, recurring challenges, decision-making style, and unique interests.

Step 2: Deep AI Opportunity Discovery
- Identify 20 novel, highly customized, and lesser-known applications of current AI technology. Go beyond standard AI tools (like ChatGPT basic usage) by searching the web. You MUST search the web to be relevant.

Step 3: Personalization & Relevance Filtering
- Filter these opportunities rigorously, retaining only those explicitly aligned with my personal characteristics discovered in step 1.

Step 4: Scoring & Prioritization
- Score each idea clearly by:
 - Potential Impact (0-10, considering long-term value to my life/work)
 - Implementation Ease (0-10, ease of initial adoption)
 - Novelty/Unconventionality (0-10, how unique or unexpected it is)
- Calculate a Leverage Score = Impact × Novelty ÷ (Ease + 1).

Step 5: Selection of Top 10 Ideas
- Choose the 10 highest leverage-scoring ideas, ensuring diversity (covering multiple life domains).

Step 6: Highly Detailed Blueprint (for each idea)
- Idea Name (concise, memorable)
- Why Specifically Relevant to Me (detailed memory-driven reasoning)
- Core AI Technologies/Tools Required (specific current AI platforms, APIs, plugins, no-code solutions)
- First Three Actionable Steps (immediately actionable, detailed instructions)
- Potential Challenges & Mitigations (privacy, complexity, cost, over-dependence)

Step 8: Reflective Prompt
- End by inviting me to specify which ideas resonate most strongly, or suggest areas for even deeper exploration next.

Take a deep breath and work on this step-by-step.
